mapper.select:
select
distinct
item_id, item_code, item_uom, item_description, start_active_date ,end_active_date, enabled_flag, object_version_number, creation_date, created_by, last_updated_by, last_update_date from ssm_item
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:

item_code,
item_uom,
item_description,
start_active_date,

concat('ITEM00',(select auto_increment from information_schema.`TABLES` where table_name='ssm_item' )),

update ssm_item
item_id = #{record.itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
item_code = #{record.itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
item_uom = #{record.itemUom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

last_update_date = #{record.lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
